title: Reflections of the Czech Republic
creator_credit: Karel Zauld and Czech Tourist Authority
brief_description: Set to a musical track and featuring no dialogue, this short film from the Czech Tourist Authority presents a montage of images depicting people at work and play in the Czech Republic; the culture, music, arts, natural wonders and traditional ceremonies of the area, creating a visual postcard of the region.
